name: SkPy 0.10.4
body:
* added basic file handling for audio/video messages (#170)
* refactored Live authentication to hopefully fix some failed logins (#145)

name: SkPy 0.10.3
body:
* fixed handling of edit markup in message content (#162)
* fixed handling of empty message content (#163, #168)

name: SkPy 0.10.2
body:
* `Skype` constructor will now auto-select the authentication mechanism based on the username
* added `SkypeMsg.mention_all` template
* fixed reading of inaccessible group chats (#151)

name: SkPy 0.10.1
body:
* restored behaviour of `SkypeConnection.liveLogin()`
* added `SkypeConnection.soapLogin()` for new login flow

name: SkPy 0.10
body:
* fixed handling of missing group chat metadata (#72)
* updated group chat URL retrieval (#115)
* added extended history retrieval (#129)
* fixed contact presence events (#130)
* fixed some handling of user IDs and deleted messages (#135)
* fixed handling of file messages with no content (#136)
* added support for SOAP authentication, replacing existing Microsoft account authentication

name: SkPy 0.9.1
body:
* support real message edit/delete (#112)
* patch for upstream flags API removal (#113)

name: SkPy 0.9
body:
* added BSD 3-clause license (#77)
* added missed call state (#83)
* remove dead directory.live.com API endpoints (#84)
* switched to new profile endpoint for user lookups (#85)
* added handling for new 1-to-1 conversations that don't yet exist on the server (#87)
* fixed handling of empty contact groups (#90)
* fixed output of token files to truncate before write (#91)
* fixed handling of emoticon markup tags (#92)

name: SkPy 0.8.2
body: * fix uploads and downloads of files (#46, #82)

name: SkPy 0.8.1
body:
* make user/chat ID regexes more lenient (#58)
* use legacy format for quotes in message plain text (#57)
* update endpoint for single contact retrieval (#61)

name: SkPy 0.8
body:
* fixed a bug causing temporary auth issues for some Live logins (#47, #54)
* bug fixes for creating conversations with bot users (#41)

name: SkPy 0.7
body:
- refactor authentication methods into provider classes
- add method to refresh an expired Skype token

name: SkPy 0.6
body:
- add alerts property to conversations
- add topic/property change event classes
- add mention message helper
- auth errors are now always wrapped by [`SkypeAuthException`](https://skpy.t.allofti.me/internal.html#skpy.core.SkypeAuthException)
- fixes for [`SkypeEventLoop`](https://skpy.t.allofti.me/api.html#skpy.main.SkypeEventLoop) and chat ID parsing

name: SkPy 0.5.1
body:
- fix authentication for breaking changes upstream
- add handling for P2P-converted chats

name: SkPy 0.5
body:
- fetch latest static resources from server
- switch to v2 contacts APIs (including blocks and groups)
- add latest Skype for Web settings
- add ability to set user mood

name: SkPy 0.4
body:
- add support for login with Microsoft account
- add profile information and settings retrieval
- test suite now included
- internal improvements to enums and formatting

name: SkPy 0.3
body:
- add Skype bot lookups
- add read/write server settings
- fix interacting with prefixed usernames (e.g. `live:foo`)
- some internal reshuffling

name: SkPy 0.2
body:
- add support for translation API, balance/entitlement retrieval
- add a few more message types
- for protocol debugging, added a `SKPY_DEBUG_HTTP` environment variable

name: SkPy 0.1.1
body:
- updates retrieval of registration token / endpoint for new status codes
- fixes re-authentication if the `login.skype.com` session is still active

name: SkPy 0.1
body:
Initial release!  Installation options:
- download from below
- download from [PyPI](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/SkPy)
- `pip install SkPy`
